languages.text: "Уйти из Имперского флота не так просто. Почему тебе позволили покинуть свой пост?"
"Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"
languages.original_text: "Уйти из Имперского флота не так просто. Почему тебе позволили покинуть свой пост?"

traits.locale_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"
"Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"
"Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"
"Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

languages.text: “帝国海军并不是想走就能走的地方，海军的人为什么会允许你离开？”
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: “帝国海军并不是想走就能走的地方，海军的人为什么会允许你离开？”

languages.text: «No es nada fácil dejar la Armada Imperial. ¿Le fue permitido dejar su puesto?».
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: «No es nada fácil dejar la Armada Imperial. ¿Le fue permitido dejar su puesto?».

languages.text: 「帝国宇宙軍を辞めるのは簡単ではないだろう。なぜ退任を許されたのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国宇宙軍を辞めるのは簡単ではないだろう。なぜ退任を許されたのだ？」

languages.text: "Es ist alles andere als leicht, die Imperiale Kriegsflotte zu verlassen. Warum wurde Euch gestattet, den Dienst zu quittieren?"
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist alles andere als leicht, die Imperiale Kriegsflotte zu verlassen. Warum wurde Euch gestattet, den Dienst zu quittieren?"

languages.text: « Il est loin d'être facile de quitter la Marine Impériale. Comment se fait-il que l'on vous ait permis de démissionner ? »
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: « Il est loin d'être facile de quitter la Marine Impériale. Comment se fait-il que l'on vous ait permis de démissionner ? »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan ayrılmak kolay iş değil. Vazifeni terk etmene neden göz yumdular?"
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Imperial Navy is far from easy. Why were you permitted to quit your post?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan ayrılmak kolay iş değil. Vazifeni terk etmene neden göz yumdular?"
